name: Wonder B-Cruise
overview: Wonder B-Cruise (also known as Wander Vehicles) takes place in a fantasy world where an army of dogs fights against an army of monkeys. The player controls the army of dogs and have to defeat the monkeys through different missions. The gameplay is the classical strategy tactical game in which the player got some units and those units got 3 movements in each turn and in those turn he can choose to use items, defend or attack using different kind of attacks movements. After selecting the units movement the player has to press the X Button to begin that turn. When the player unit encounters the enemy unit he can choose to continue the movement or attack them, if he choose to continue the movement the enemy units will still fire against him.
